roleset.name: want to, (cause to be) tending towards, prone to,
roleset.note: INCLINE-V NOTES: The trace points back to the subject, but leave that for thesubordinated verb. *this frame was set up under the faulty assumption that there were no active instances, but there clearly are many, for instance: "his honour inclined him to forgive." VN class has agent, patient and stimulus args, all of which occur. Of course agent would much rather be arg0 than arga, but whatchagonnnado. (from incline.01-v)
INCLINATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, incline.01. Corresponds to VNcls addict-96. (from inclination.01-n)
INCLINED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, incline.01. Corresponds to VNcls addict-96 (from inclined.01-j)

roles.note: If an agent ever comes up, call it argA like in the verb frame. Unlike the verb frame, I think it is extremely unlikely to occur in the nominalization. Arg2 added due to usage with nominalization. (from inclination.01-n)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: While no doubt agreeing with Mr. Lawson on everything else, Sir Alan is a dyed-in-the-wool monetarist, inclined *trace* to defend floating rates to the death.
example.arg: *trace* to defend floating rates to the death

example.name: all args
example.text: His great zeal inclined him to go and preach the faith to these northern nations .
example.arg: to go and preach the faith to these northern nations.

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: I suspect you are wrong on the voting inclinations of the moderates , and especially the ones you call tea baggers .

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: The St John's Grove families have divided loyalties: we are members of two parties and with voting inclinations towards a third.

example.name: both args
example.text: I 'm not going to report my mate for driving at 80 on the motorway but if I suspected he was a serial killer I might be inclined to tell somebody

example.name: with CXN
example.text: Some people are more inclined towards philosophy than others.

roleset.name: angled, at a slope
roleset.note: INCLINED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from inclined.02-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: The plane is inclined at an angle of 30 degrees.
